mapper.insert:
SELECT WISHLIST_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( WISHLIST_NO, GOODS_NO, MEMBER_ID, ATTRIBUTE_NO, REGDATE ) VALUES ( #{WISHLIST_NO}, #{GOODS_NO}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{ATTRIBUTE_NO}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT WISHLIST_NO, MEMBER_ID, GOODS_NO, CONTENT, ATTRIBUTE_NO, NAME, PRICE, COLOR, GOODS_SIZE, WM_CONCAT(SAV_NAME) AS IMAGE FROM ( SELECT a.CONTENT, a.PRICE, a.NAME, b.ATTRIBUTE_NO, b.COLOR, b.GOODS_SIZE, c.SAV_NAME, d.WISHLIST_NO, d.MEMBER_ID, d.GOODS_NO FROM GOODS a, GOODS_ATTRIBUTE b, UPLOAD c, WISHLIST d WHERE d.GOODS_NO=a.GOODS_NO AND d.ATTRIBUTE_NO=b.ATTRIBUTE_NO AND b.GOODS_NO=a.GOODS_NO AND c.GOODS_NO = d.GOODS_NO AND d.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} ORDER BY WISHLIST_NO DESC ) GROUP BY WISHLIST_NO, MEMBER_ID, GOODS_NO, CONTENT, PRICE, ATTRIBUTE_NO, COLOR, NAME, GOODS_SIZE
